scripts.server/build: cd server && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.server/serve: cd server && npm run serve && cd ..
scripts.server/db:reset: cd server && npm run db:reset && cd ..
scripts.server/db:seed: cd server && npm run db:seed && cd ..
scripts.erase-db: docker pause mosaic_web_1 mosaic_api_1 && cd server/ && yarn run db:clear
